mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLES (CID, RATING, BOARD_TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT) values ( #{cid}, #{rating}, #{boardType}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_TYPE AS boardType, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM ARTICLES order by ARTICLESEQ DESC) A LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
SELECT * FROM ARTICLES WHERE ARTICLESEQ LIKE #{articleseq}
